Question
========

Of 9 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 9 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 17 and the standard deviation is 37. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 0.72
* 1.38
* 1.82
* 3.56

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.72: Incorrect
* 1.38: Correct
* 1.82: Incorrect
* 3.56: Incorrect
